synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with DMA (50 ml three times) and water (50 ml, three times)
washed with DMA (50 ml three times) and water (50 ml, three times)

synthesis_conditions.solvent_exchange: exchanged the guest and coordination solvents (DMA and water) with methanol by soaking at 60 °C for 7 days, every 8 hours, the methanol was replaced by a new one
synthesis_conditions.activation: dried under vacuum at 60 °C for 3 hours, then activated at 393 K under vacuum for 10 hours

synthesis_conditions.adsorption_process: The temperature was decreased from 393 to 298 K (or 278, 288, 308, and 323 K) at a rate of 10 K min−1. Once the temperature reached 298 K, the He flow bubbled to a liquid mixture of H2O and D2O, and then the mixed vapour flowed at ambient pressure, and the temperature was kept at 298 K (or 278, 288, 308, and 323 K) for a certain period under flowing mixed vapour.
